sourcesContent:
//Tabla que muestra el progreso de isoTracker import "./progressTable.css" import React, {useEffect} from 'react' const ProgressTable = props =>{ var headers, progress //Si el user es admin muestra mas informacion const currentProgress = props.progress const currentProgressWidth = String(currentProgress)+"%" const currentRealProgress = props.realProgress const currentRealProgressWidth = String(currentRealProgress)+"%" let updateData = props.updateData let currentProgressISO = props.progress useEffect(()=>{ console.log(props.progress) },[ props.progress]) console.log(currentProgressISO) const currentProgressISOWidth = String(currentProgress)+"%" const currentRealProgressISO = props.realProgress const currentRealProgressWidthISO = String(currentRealProgress)+"%" if (props.user === "admin"){ headers = Progress Progress ISO Real progress Real progress ISO progress =
2%
{currentProgressISO}%
2%
60%
}else{ headers = Progress Progress ISO progress =
40%
50%
} return ( {headers} {progress}
); }; export default ProgressTable;
